name: @framp/frappe
description: A library for defining UI components based on time and events
author: Federico Rampazzo <frampone@gmail.com> (https://framp.me/)

scripts.pretty: prettier --no-semi --single-quote --write src/*.ts examples/*.tsx && tslint src/*.ts examples/*.tsx --fix
scripts.prepare-pr: npm run pretty && npm test && npm run docs && npm run build
scripts.publish-docs: cd ../frappe-site && rm -rf docs examples && mv ../frappe/docs . && mv ../frappe/examples-build examples && git add -A . && git commit -m "Update docs and examples" && git push
